1063700.name: ProtoDungeon: Episode III
1063700.description:
ProtoDungeon: Episode III is a short adventure game which draws from Game Boy Color sensibilities. Escape from the Third Nightmare, using nothing but the magic item you find there beneath a shriveled lotus tree. Jump, swim, and dash to unlock your way through a seaside cove, discover what's inside the shipwreck, and maybe get closer to solving the mystery of the nightmare prison by reaching that familiar chapel...

ProtoDungeon is the mini-series prequel to The Waking Cloak. Stay tuned for further announcements!

Note: you don't need to play the first two episodes to enjoy this one!
